info.name: Will Sutherland
description: I'm a Software Developer and Computer Science student at The University of Sheffield, entering the final year of my degree.
I have completed 2 internships at Hewlett Packard, I regularly contribute to GitHub, and I have received multiple awards from my University for academic excellence.
I am also a member of the University Hockey Club and the Computer Science Society Football Team.

projects.name: SideRank
projects.description: A web application for business employees to evaluate solutions to challenges proposed by their employer. We created it for the company sideways6 as part of a University module. Our application was chosen to be the winner by our individual client, as well as being chosen as the overall best application in the year.

projects.name: Slack_Connect_4_Bot
projects.description: A bot to play Connect 4 on Slack. It was featured on TheNextWeb.com and was trending on GitHub.

projects.name: Gradients
projects.description: A web application for students to store their grades and track their progress.

projects.name: blog
projects.description: My blog. Written using Jekyll, the static site generator.

projects.name: Cisco_IoE_Challenge
projects.description: Chosen to represent The University Of Sheffield at the event at Media City. We created a system to proactively manage passenger flow at Transport Service Facilities in Greater Manchester.

projects.name: Orbit
projects.description: An interactive query visualiser designed to illustrate advanced search techniques within HP's Big Data product suite.

projects.name: Update_Tracker
projects.description: A RESTful API to tracks updates for HP IDOL servers, along with a companion CMS.

projects.name: Phloto
projects.description: Display a user's Instagram posts as a flowing grid.

projects.name: Server_Scaler
projects.description: A Node.js system to interact with RabbitMQ and calculate the optimal number of online servers to maximise profit and minimise queue wait times. With an accompanying visualiser.

projects.name: Haven_on_Demand_Load_Gatherer
projects.description: A Node.js system to monitor load on HP's Haven on Demand servers and send data to the real time graphing service, Graphite.

projects.name: TinX
projects.description: T in X - a simple time constants library in CoffeeScript.

projects.name: Doubly Linked List
projects.description: A JavaScript implementation of a doubly-linked list.

projects.name: Woodchopper
projects.description: Selective logging based on command line arguments and keys, written in CoffeeScript.

projects.name: Flagger
projects.description: Easily access all flags and arguments passed into node programs.
